title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (2021) The name of this wine translates to 'Stony Hill', the grapes coming from the rockiest slopes on the Banfi estate in Tuscany. Currants and fresh red berries on the nose, little oak influence if any, just a touch of dusty green olive from the Cabernet component. Plenty of cherry-ripe sweetness on the palate, blackberries too, combining some fruit depth with fresher, lightly herbal notes. Plenty of creamy sweetness here with a sour tang of orange to the acidity.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (2019) A blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon and 30% Sangiovese, this is a perfumed and very pleasing red, a touch of herbs and graphite, the ripeness of black Cabernet fruit, and the tangy vibrancy of Sangiovese cherries all present and correct. In the mouth there is a sweet and creamy edge to this, substantial but with a creamy softness to the tannins and acidity that give it enough structure while leaving it pizza and spag-bol friendly.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: Im der Nase schöne Fruchtnoten mit Kirsche und Pflaume, dazu florale und würzige Anklänge. Am Gaumen rund, schmeichelnd und trinkig. Benjamin Herzog & Dominik Vombach

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: Kirsche, Cassis, im Duft reintönig und klar. Am Gaumen mit viel Saft und einer ausgewogenen Struktur, eher mild im Tannin, ein angenehmer Tischwein zu Antipasti (z.?B. grilliertem Gemüse). Ulrich Sautter

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: A blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with cherry cola, sweet fruit, spice and dried rosemary aromas. It is easy-drinking and bright, with a touch of fruity sweetness on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: Not a bad entry-level Tuscan red; it shows sweet bubble gum and LifeSaver aromas with just enough darkness to make it nice. Very young and cheeky in the mouth, meaning it's kind of hard, tannic and scratchy. But it's also fully ripe, thus with pizza or spaghetti it won't hurt at all.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (2001) Jammy, sweet, blackcurranty nose that is ripe and lush. Theres a nice zing of acidity running through the palate, very cherryish but theres a dark, more dusty black fruit too. Good mouthfeel and nice balance giving good length. Very good - a 50/50 Sangiovese/Cabernet Sauvignon blend.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (2000) Rich, sweet berry and cherry fruit on the nose, little notes of soft brown sugar. Firm, tight and juicy palate. Good fruit and structure at the price.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (1999) Ruby/cherry red. Bright. Subdued but attractive nose with zippy cherry and raspberry fruit and sweet vanillin. Savoury on the palate. Good sour-cherry fruit and more sweet oak, with firm tannins and prominent lemon acidity. Creamy consistency. Finish is quite long, but full of drying tannins.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: Purple in the middle and light on the edges. A candied, sweet, simple red with plum, raisin and chocolate flavors. Bold and basic.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: Fruttato e ricco nella matrice principale mostra note di fragole, prugne, ribes e mirtilli pressati. Corpo pieno, struttura armonica e bilanciata ed un finale davvero solido e masticabile di ottima fattura. Bevi ora.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: A lot of energy in the primary profile showing notes of raspberries, currants, mandarin peel and orange zest. Full bodied, a harmonic, balanced structure and a warm, enveloping finale which gives pleasure sip after sip. Drink now.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: (2020) Who doesn't love a wine like this occasionally? Is it red or rosé? Well, that's a moot point but it's nice to include this cherry-pink wine here as it certainly captures the summery spirit of rosé wines. This Piedmont wine is gently sparkling and off-dry, a counterpoint to the low alcohol Moscatos of the region with only 7% abv. Made from the Brachetto grape grown in the town of Acqui Terme, the wine is stored 0°C in Banfi’s 19th century cellars. It is frothy and offer a gorgeous pot-pourri of liquidised strawberry, pepper and sherbet with a touch of dark chocolate to boot. Mouthfilling, creamy and sweet, that pulpy strawberry sundae sweetness is balanced by just the right level of acidity and a hint of stemmy earthiness, into a long finish. Perfect summer in garden stuff.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: Brachetto d'Acqui is a sweet, red sparkling wine that would pair with white chocolate desserts, pecan pie or moist chocolate chip cookies. It's an easy, fruity wine with loads of berry, cassis and raspberry on the sweet finish.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: Aromas of fresh summer fruits are countered by an earthy note whose contribution is questionable. Light on the palate with nice strawberry fruit but turns a bit cloying on the finish. Mousse lacks persistence. Drink now.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: A berry cornucopia with bursting raspberry, strawberry and blueberry—just like a good Brachetto d'Acqui should be. Also typical of this style of sweet, sparkling wine with low alcohol is its soda pop fizz in the mouth and spicy finish. Imported by Banfi Vintners.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: Distinct notes of cranberry and raspberry on the nose and palate are accented by wisps of toast and rolled oats. The acidity is elegantly wrapped in juicy fruit. As in previous vintages, this is a clean, classic and delicious treat. —K.F.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: Displays a pleasing array of earth, spring flowers and red berries on the nose, but seems simple and sweet in the mouth.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: Heavy on the rose petal and raspberry compote aromas, and also heavy on the palate. Yes, there's definitely a touch of cherry cough syrup to this red sparkler. To enjoy this you have to like yours sweet; maybe best with a custard dessert or vanilla ice cream. It's too sweet and candied for chocolate.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Rosa Regale' Spumante
content: This rosé sparkler is very sweet, as it's meant to be, with cherry and strawberry aromas and flavors. The sweetness would be more palatable if it were supported by higher acidity, but here it's like the juice in frozen strawberries. Still, many people will just love it—maybe as a Bracchetto float with vanilla ice cream.

title: Castello Banfi Vigna Marrucheto
content: Bright ruby red. On the nose of noble wood, mint, milk chocolate, ripe cherries and wild berries. On the palate currently very chewy and bold, shows a lot of structure, but in the final gruff and wild with firm drive.

title: Castello Banfi Vigna Marrucheto
content: Dynamic and spicy showing notes of black prunes, blackberries, cinnamon powder, vetiver, white musk, linden, incense and guaranà. A lot of Mediterranean hints describe the secondary scene. Medium to full bodied, velvety tannins of optimum workmanship and a graceful, captivating finale which demands a return to the glass. Better from 2024.

title: Castello Banfi Vigna Marrucheto
content: Aromas of fragrant blue flowers, baked plum and mocha shape the nose. Bold and brawny, the full-bodied palate offers prune, dried cherry, licorice and the heat of evident alcohol alongside close-grained, drying tannins. Give the tannins another year or two, then drink sooner rather than later. Drink 2023–2028. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Vigna Marrucheto
content: Dunkel leuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase deutliche Holzwürze, dann fleischige Beerenfrucht, Waldbeeren, Brombeeren, Pfeffer und Leder, auch nach Veilchen. Am Gaumen mit engem Tannin, spannt sich wuchtig auf, kernig-griffiger Verlauf, im Finale auf zart malzigen Tönen, trocknet nach.

title: Castello Banfi Vigna Marrucheto
content: Deep and dark in the primary profile showing notes of bleck prunes, incense, dates, sweet caramel and roasted hazelnuts. Full bodied, incredibly refined soft tannins and a finale that gives beauty in every sip and demands a return to the glass. Splendid now but better from 2023.

title: Castello Banfi Vigna Marrucheto
content: The newest addition to Banfi's Brunello lineup, this single-vineyard offering boasts firm structure, finesse and radiance. Aged in large French casks, it opens with enticing aromas of blue flower, menthol, forest floor and star anise. On the full-bodied palate, tightly wound, fine-grained tannins accompany juicy Marasca cherry, blood orange, licorice and a hint of espresso while fresh acidity keeps it balanced. Still young and primary, it shows great aging potential and needs time to fully develop. Drink 2026–2041. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Vigna Marrucheto
content: Dark ruby red. Filigree of mint, blackberries on the nose, also briefly elderberries, then pepper-spicy and rich cherries. On the palate slightly creamy, with polished core, spreads across well, still very young, opens in the back on pithy tannin, good foresight.

title: Castello Banfi Vigna Marrucheto
content: Wild and wanton in the primary profile showing a herbaceous structure that reveals scents of broken stalks, cut grass, celery and thyme. In the background the sensory complexity gives traces of unripe red prunes and white peaches. Medium to full bodied, vibrant and tight on the palate showing soft and well smoothed tannins and a hot finale which is persistent on the palate. Remarkable from the start but will be better from 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Ricordi gialli emergono dal calice come prugne gialle, ananas acerba ed albicocche premature. Nel profilo secondario, mallo di noce, mandorle verdi ed olive verdi. Al palato, corpo medio-pieno, tannini rigidi ed un finale a cui manca un po' di equilibrio.

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Sattes Granatrot mit bräunlichen Reflexen. An der Nase reife Kirschfrucht und schwarze Holunderbeere, auch etwas Lebkuchen und Orangenschale, dann Schokolade. Schwungvoller Gaumeneintritt mit viel Saft und guter Frucht, im Körper mittelgewichtig, zieht sich feinmaschig durch, wirkt noch recht jung und trotzdem schon sehr harmonisch.

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Molto maturo al naso ed aperto nel profilo principale mostra note di fragole ed amarene sotto spirito unite a sfumature di mandorle bianche. Corpo medio, tannini soffici privi di grip e mordenza ed un finale semplice. Bevi ora.

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc opens with aromas of dark-skinned berry, leather and a whiff of mocha. The juicy, balanced palate delivers blackberry jam, star anise and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2024. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Klare Beerennase umspielt von Lakritz- und Sandelholznoten; kompakte Textur, spürbare Säure, in Balance mit den Gerbstoffen, das Finale klassisch-elegant. Mit Potenzial.

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: In der Nase reife, eingekochte dunkle Früchte, Pflaume und Kirsche, dazu Lakritze und feine ätherische Noten. Am Gaumen weich, füllig und doch elegant, mit viel Schmelz ausgestattet, leicht spürbares Tannin und harmonischer Gesamteindruck. Dominik Vombach

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Metallische Noten im Duft, Bitterschokolade. Etwas Cassis. Sehr weich grundiert, dann eine langsam angreifende und den Gaumen schließlich stark belegende Tanninfrucht, deutliche Grüntöne, rappige Gaumenmitte, wirkt forciert und wenig harmonisch. Benjamin Herzog, Ulrich Sautter, Dominik Vombach

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Made from Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, this evokes aromas of spiced blueberry, baking spice and a hint of mocha. The savory palate offers black-currant jam, licorice and a touch of cocoa alongside polished tannins.

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Dark berry, spiced blueberry, violet and a note of baking spice lead the nose of this wine made mostly with Cabernet Sauvignon and some Cabernet Franc. The concentrated palate offers black cherry, coffee, tobacco and a licorice note alongside polished tannins.

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Made from Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, this soft wine opens with aromas of ripe red berries, plum, blue flower and toasted oak. The palate offers fleshy black cherry accented with notes of coffee and chocolate accompanying round tannins. It's already extremely accessible so enjoy soon.

title: Castello Banfi Aska Bolgheri
content: Banfi’s Bolgeri vineyard produced a ‘Bordeaux’ wine made mostly from Cabernet Sauvignon with an addition of Cabernet Franc. The color is very bold with dark reflections, while the aroma is intense with warm notes of cinchona on an aromatic bed of ripe fruit and the classic verdant scents. There is also some intense vanilla and evolving notes of cacao from the wood. The mouthfeel is intense with a nice attack that then lingers a little too long on the tannins, creating a texture that today is a littl e fleshy. The finish is tasty even if the tannins tend to dry it out.

title: Castello Banfi 'La Pettegola' Vermentino Toscana IGT
content: Preciso e succoso al naso mostra note di fiori di limone, gardenie, buccia di lime e timo selvatico. Corpo pieno, grasso ed avvolgente nel sorso chiude armonico e decisamente brillante. Bevi ora.

title: Castello Banfi 'La Pettegola' Vermentino Toscana IGT
content: (2022) I last tasted this wine in the 2019 vintage, and while scoring it exactly the same - 88 points out of 100 - then it's price was £12.99 and I liked it enough to make it Wine of the Week. This cuvée is very similar, an unoaked white wine with a distinct pear and peach fruit character, a hint of talcum, and a certain solidity and intensity of flavour and texture that is quite mouth-filling and yet crisp. It is subtle without making a great impact in either aromatics or flavour. There's nothing wrong with subtlety, but now that the price has risen to £18 I am slightly more reserved about the wine I must say. £12.99 is still in the ballpark of where I could have given it more whole-hearted approval: it is a very good, example, but for me not distinctive enough to ask £18.00.

title: Castello Banfi 'La Pettegola' Vermentino Toscana IGT
content: (2021) Though Banfi is headquartered in Montalcino, the Vermentino grapes for this wine come from more coastal vineyards in the Maremma region of Tuscany. It's a delicate, perfumed style of crisp white wine, notes of talcum and peach down, a touch of elderflower in the background. In the mouth it has that combination that many Italian whites from the centre of the country share (Verdicchio, Vernaccia), of intensity and subtley. There is plenty of stony mineral salts acidity but gentle and clean citrus fruit, just a hint of that peachier quality on the mid-palate. title: Castello Banfi 'La Pettegola' Vermentino Toscana IGT
content: Here's a fun, friendly white with aromas of tropical fruit and apricot. The aromas follow over to the tangy palate, along with grapefruit and a candied note set against crisp acidity. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi 'La Pettegola' Vermentino Toscana IGT
content: Vermentino with just a tad of Sauvignon that is fermented, naturally, only in stainless steel. The color does not stand out but it does have glittering green reflections. The aroma is intense and extremely clean with notes of passion fruit, pineapple, eucalyptus and lychees. The mouthfeel is fruity and nicely articulated, rich in freshness and progression with everything translating into great drinkability. The finish is consistent and even if it does not end with a bang the persistence is good. This wine is a clear example of the craftsmanship of the technical team at Banfi, both in the vineyard and in the cellar. It can be paired with any seafood dish as well as vegetable first courses.

content: Clear ruby with slightly brightening rim. Very clear and fragrant nose, full of fresh raspberries and cherries. Also on the palate vivid fruit, grippy tannin, unfortunately dries out a bit in the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Superiore DOCG
content: Clear ruby. Smells on the nose of blackberries and fresh cherries, medium intensity. Supple and juicy in the attack and course, fine cherry fruit until the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Superiore DOCG
content: Ripe black-skinned berry aromas mix with a whiff of dark spice in this simple, everyday red. Reflecting the nose, the informal palate offers black cherry and clove hints alongside easygoing tannins. Drink now. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Superiore DOCG
content: Banfi's informal Chianti opens with sweet fruit and spice followed by sour cherry and bramble. Pair this no-fuss Italian red with lasagna or ravioli with cheese.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Superiore DOCG
content: Banfi's Chianti Superiore opens with easy but bright and cheerful aromas of cherry, raspberry and cassis. The mouthfeel is thin and compact but the wine has the natural acidity to pair with risotto or cheesy pasta.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: (2019) In Italy it's name is Pinot Grigio, but the grape variety is also known as Pinot Gris in France, and in recent decades world wine producers who grow and bottle the variety have tended to use these terms as a sort of short-hand for style - sometimes even quality. It's fair to say that the reputation of Italian Pinot Grigio has suffered from cheap, over-cropped and commercial wines that have become the staple of by-the-glass white wine in pubs and bars, the fairly indiscriminate choice of people who just want "an inofessive glass of white." So Pinot Grigio - as opposed to Gris - has an arguably deserved poor reputation among some wine lovers, but that does a huge diservice to many very good, very carefully made examples from the variety's heartland in the north of Italy, but also wines like this, made much further south, in Tuscany. Banfi's Grigio comes from vineyards in the southern part of Montalcino, and has genuine fruit sweetness and ripeness (rather than residual sugar) and a fair degree of concentration. Fleshy stone fruits and citrus on the nose lead on to an expansive palate, with Ogen melon and more lemon rind weight and citrus intensity, the acidity gentle but persistent, giving this easy drinking appeal for sure, but a bit of class, weight and authority too. A very nice example.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: Pinot Grigio enthusiasts will love this citrusy expression from Tuscany. There's just enough warm-climate ripeness here to give the wine a full, creamy feel on the finish, yet the bouquet is all about freshness; notes of lemon-lime, melon and white peach are prominent.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: Castello Banfi's Tuscan take on the popular Pinot Grigio grape always delivers good cheer and a sunny disposition. Mature notes of peach, melon and grapefruit give the wine dimension and personality.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: Here's a perfectly correct and clean Pinot Grigio from Tuscany that shows evidence of a deft and technologically savvy team of winemakers. The wine boasts well-dosed perfumes of wild flowers, citrus and stone fruit with a crisp finish that would pair well with all informal foods and salads.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: Most Italian Pinot Grigio is made in the northern part of the peninsula, and consequently a Tuscan version comes as a pleasant surprise. This is a very fresh wine redolent of apple, pear, exotic star fruit and white grapes. The nose is clean as a whistle, and the mouth is spicy and crisp. Imported by Banfi Vintners.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: Creamy, rich and sun-drenched Tuscan fruit always makes this Grigio stand out in a crowd. The differences between this and cooler-climate wines include generous summertime aromas such as yellow rose, ripe melon, tropical fruit, jasmine and a fuller body. But you forego that extra crispness of northern regions. Imported by Banfi Vintners.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: (2006) Lovely nose here, with a pungent, vivid herbal streak and lots of gooseberry fruit. On the palate this has good intensity and punchy, vivid orchard fruits, with a lovely streak of lemony acidity.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: (2002) From top Chianti producer Castello Banfi, this has a fat, aromatically rich nose, with aromas of nuts, figs, berries, custard, melon and orchard fruits. After that entrance, it holds up pretty well on the palate, where a medium-bodied, chewy texture supplies plenty of nutty, sweet-edged apricot and peach kernel fruit, and a wrapping of oily lemon acidity.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: Pinot Grigio is more commonly associated with northern Italian regions, but Banfi's Tuscan entry is a solid and fairly full-bodied contender. Lime and herb notes underlay the melon and pineapple fruit, and the mouthfeel is supple, almost rich-unusual for this varietal. The wine finishes positively, with herb and subdued tropical fruit notes. Best Buy.

title: Castello Banfi Pinot Grigio San Angelo Toscana IGT
content: Tuscany is not well known for its Pinot Grigios. Yet from Banfi comes this very credible take on the grape. Opens with floral and fruity, even sweet, aromas. Almost Viognier-like. Lots of flavor: fairly rich apricot, even cherry-tinged fruit. Tangy acidity to balance.

title: Castello Banfi 'Fontanelle' Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: Precise and with a strong personality this Chardonnay shows an open, well projected profile which alternates notes of apple, apricot with a lot of tropical hints of pineapple, lemon blossom and white pepper. Medium to full bodied, serious and complex showing precision of execution and medium to long progression. Drink now.

title: Castello Banfi 'Fontanelle' Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: Castello Banfi in Tuscany does a great job with Chardonnay, as evidenced by this wine. It's rich and soft, with bright aromas of peach, citrus, vanilla and savory herb. A pinch of acidity on the finish works beautifully as well.

title: Castello Banfi 'Fontanelle' Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: Here's a very pretty Chardonnay with the warmth and intensity of the Tuscan sunshine locked within. The wine opens with attractive softness and lingering aromas of almond and yellow rose.

title: Castello Banfi 'Fontanelle' Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: This is a lovely Chardonnay from Tuscany with a full bouquet of honey and stone fruit aromas. The wine is thick and rich in texture with impressive intensity and persistency on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi 'Fontanelle' Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: Aromas of lemon drop, butter, dust and fresh-cut wood are sizable, as is the palate, which pushes mango, peach and pineapple. It's a fairly big mouthful overall, with somewhat of a waxy feel. Good but only reaches modest heights.

title: Castello Banfi 'Fontanelle' Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: Delicious!

title: Castello Banfi Le Rime Pinot Grigio - Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: Le Rime is made as both a Chardonnay-Pinot Grigio blend and as a pure expression of Pinot Grigio for the U.S. market. Easy and fresh, this wine has touches of pear and citrus.

title: Castello Banfi Le Rime Pinot Grigio - Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: Food friendly, informal and bright, this easy-drinking Pinot Grigio opens with bright citrus, stone fruit and melon. There's a touch of white almond paste on the close that recalls the warm Tuscan sunshine.

title: Castello Banfi Le Rime Pinot Grigio - Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: This innocuous, large-volume (60,000 cases) Chadonnay-Pinot Grigio blend deals orange and apple cider on the nose, followed by chunky melon, peach and apple flavors. Short but good enough; inoffensive and not difficult to quaff.

title: Castello Banfi Le Rime Pinot Grigio - Chardonnay Toscana IGT
content: Very nice dry/crisp table wine. Worth every penny !

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Bright, radiant ruby red. On the nose bacon, malt and cold smoke, plus grated blueberries and earthy tones. On the palate hearty, with rich tannins, loosely knit, also juicy, then becomes a bit brittle in the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Summer strawberries, woodland raspberries and Sicilian oranges intoxicate the glass. In the secondary profile rose petals, talcum and face powder. Medium to full bodied on the palate, soft tannins and a juicy, cohesive finale. Drink now or hold.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Eucalyptus, wild berry and dark spice aromas lead the nose. The firm palate offers dried cherry, roasted coffee bean and a dollop of vanilla alongside assertive, rather astringent tannins that grip the close. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Dunkles, leuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase mit wenig Ausdruck, etwas Weichselkirsche und Malzkaffee. Am Gaumen sehr satt, mit satter Frucht und kompakter Säure, im Finale schmelzig.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Open in the primary profile showing notes of mixed red flowers, linden, jasmine, cherries, white almonds and bay. Medium to full bodied, soft tannins and a rounded, enveloping finale of pleasant horizontal workmanship. Drink now.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Zurückhaltendes, rotfruchtiges Bouquet mit Noten von Sauerkirsche und roter Johannisbeere. Dazu etwas Mokka, Karamell und fleischige Anklänge. Am Gaumen leicht, saftig, präsente Säure, schmelziger Kern, feines Tannin. Bodenständiger Eindruck.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Aromas of French oak, mature plum, coconut and camphor lead the nose. On the dense, easygoing palate, licorice and espresso notes accent black cherry. It's already accessible, with buffed tannins. Drink through 2022. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Funkelndes Rubinrot mit leicht aufhellendem Rand. Einladende Nase nach frischen Kirschen und Himbeeren, leichter Rosenduft. Am Gaumen leider trocknend und harsch.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: The nose is fruity and offers a small incisive side, a slight freshness as well as a slight juiciness. It reveals notes of redcurrant, wild blackberry, wild berries and racy minerality associated with subtle hints of spices, violet as well as an imperceptible hint of Cuben pepper. The palate is fruity, well-balanced, precise / well defined, sleek, a bit aerial and offers tension, fat, a slight mineral frame, a slight freshness as well as a small fat. On the palate this wine expresses notes of black cherry, crunchy / ripe red berries and small notes of blackberry, cherry pit associated with slight touches of olive as well as an imperceptible hint of olive tree, colas and sweet spices / chocolate. Tannins are fine and slightly dry. Good length. There is a touch of acidulous fruits on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Intense garnet still in its youth. Subtle nose of stone fruits with a spice dimension. Supple attack, rich, nervy, balanced palate with smooth, full substance framed by tannins that have yet to soften. Lovely honesty. Keep for 3 years.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: French oak, dark berry, underbrush and espresso aromas open with a whiff of coconut. The firm palate offers roasted coffee bean, sour cherry, cranberry and a hint of vanilla alongside vibrant acidity and fine-grained tannins that leave an assertive finish.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: The nose is elegant and more intense than on the Cuvée Castello Banfi 2013 – Rosso di Montalcino . It reveals notes of cherry, black cherry and slight notes of blackberry associated with slight notes of pepper, leather, dried tea and a touch of garrigue and olive. The palate is fruity, mineral, fresh, slightly smooth, quite elegant and quite ample. In the mouth this wine expresses notes of blackberry, black cherry and cherry associated with slight notes of cassis, touches of raspberry as well as slight notes of cherry juice and spices. Tannins are fine and quite present. Good length.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Clear garnet. Appealing nose of morello cherry, plum and a fine vegetal note. Supple attack, charming, full, invigorating palate revealing more of the nose aromas supported by some subtle tannins. A distinctive, successful wine that needs a few years to mature.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: The nose is relatively quiet, slightly austere and fine. It reveals notes of black fruit, cherry, oak and slight notes of tobacco, vanilla and hazelnut. The palate is mineral and balanced. It expresses notes of cherry, raspberry and slight notes of fig, clove and garrigue associated with a touch of salt, licorice and oak. A relatively tannic wine. Tannins are supple. Good length.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Rosso di Montalcino
content: Round and savory, this medium-bodied Rosso opens with aromas that recall underbrush, tobacco leaf, and cooking spices. The dense palate doles out rich black fruit accented with cinnamon, clove and licorice alongside supple tannins. It's made to be drunk young so enjoy now through 2015.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora Rose Alta Langa
content: Leuchtendes Rosa. In der Nase Noten von kleinen roten Früchten und einige krautige Anklänge. Dynamisches, aber ausgewogenes, intensives Mundgefühl, das zu einem leicht würzigen Abgang mit zarten Anklängen an reife Früchte führt.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora Rose Alta Langa
content: Complesso e terso nel profilo sensoriale mostra note di petali di rosa, gerani, albicocche e pesche bianche. Corpo medio, struttura rotonda ed un finale di media distensione. Bevi ora.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora Rose Alta Langa
content: This lovely sparkler opens with enticing scents of forest berry, blue flower, crushed herb and the barest whiff of fresh pastry shell. Bone-dry and savory, the radiant palate boasts a heady combination of finesse and racy tension, offering pomegranate, strawberry, citrus and hazelnut alongside crisp acidity and a lively, refined perlage. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora Rose Alta Langa
content: Chamomile flower, red berry and pastry dough aromas lift out of the glass. The tangy palate offers sour cherry, Rennet apple and a yeasty hint of bread crust alongside racy acidity and a lively perlage. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora Rose Alta Langa
content: Made entirely with Pinot Nero, this bright sparkler delivers wild raspberry, cherry and cake-spice sensations along with a hint of baked bread. Fresh acidity lifts the finish.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora Rose Alta Langa
content: Made withPinot Nero, this delivers a fragrance of rose and perfumed red berry. The lively palate offers wild strawberry layered with raspberry, pink grapefruit, light spice and white almond alongside bright acidity and a persistent perlage.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora Rose Alta Langa
content: This is a perfect wine for outdoor receptions or apéritif time. This pale pink sparkler is refreshing and clean, with pretty berry and floral nuances, backed by a creamy mouthfeel and bright acidity. All these qualities make it perfect for pairing with a wide array of finger foods.

title: Banfi Vigne Regali 'Tener' Sauvignon - Chardonnay Spumante Brut
content: This light and refreshing Brut sparkling wine represents a blend of Sauvignon and Chardonnay grapes. The wine offers lively floral aromas backed by white peach and passion fruit and a clean, crisp mouthfeel.

title: Castello Banfi Fonte alla Selva
content: Full and enveloping on the nose offering notes of blackcurrants, raspberries and wild strawberries. Medium bodied, rounded tannins and a well projected, juicy finale. Good drinkability, perfect for the less pretentious. Drink now.

title: Castello Banfi Fonte alla Selva
content: Bright and easygoing, this has aromas of ripe red-skinned fruit and tilled earth with a whiff of blue flowers. The straightforward palate offers mature Marasca cherry and clove alongside solid tannins. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Fonte alla Selva
content: Note di lamponi e mirtilli con un leggero sottofondo di mandorla dolce. Corpo medio-leggero, leggermente diluito nel centro palato, tannino leggermente secco e finale semplice. Bevi ora.

title: Castello Banfi Fonte alla Selva
content: Intensives Rubin. Zeigt sich in der Nase etwas unpräzise, nach Unterholz und reifen Kirschen, leichte Lederwürze. Spannt sich mit griffiger Tanninstruktur auf, gewisse Saftigkeit, zarte Nachtrocknung.

title: Castello Banfi Fonte alla Selva
content: Kraftvolles Rubinrot. Sehr zurückhaltende Nase, öffnet sich nur zögerlich. Am Gaumen sehr wahrnehmbare Säure, mittelgewichtig, vermisst ein wenig Frucht, wirkt noch sehr jung.

title: Castello Banfi Fonte alla Selva
content: Raspberry jam, underbrush and blue flower aromas lead the nose. The palate shows mature blackberry, cassis and a hint of ground pepper alongside dusty tannins. Drink through 2020. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Fonte alla Selva
content: This soft, easy-drinking red opens with aromas of French oak, plum, vanilla and a sprinkling of clove. The juicy, straightforward palate offers black cherry, coffee and a hint of anise alongside round tannins and bright acidity. Enjoy through 2017.

title: Castello Banfi Fonte alla Selva
content: Blackberry and pressed violet aromas come together along with a whiff of espresso on this medium-bodied red. The easy-drinking palate offers wild cherry, plum and cooking spice accompanied by smooth, polished tannins. Drink through 2018.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora
production: Alta Langa Metodo Classico DOCG, Italy
content: Blassgelb mit leicht grünlichen Reflexen. Tone von Butter und getrockneten Früchten verbinden sich mit einem Hauch von Zitrusfrüchten und bilden den Auftakt zu einem vollen, cremigen und leicht würzigen Schluck. Endet mit leichten Mandeltonen.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora
production: Alta Langa Metodo Classico DOCG, Italy
content: Aperto al naso mostra note di fiori bianchi, talco e sapone di Marsiglia. Corpo medio, struttura lineare di buona vivacità ed un finale essenziale. Bevi ora.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora
production: Alta Langa Metodo Classico DOCG, Italy
content: Aromas of toasted bread crust, botanical herbs and chamomile form the subtle nose. All about finesse, the dry, savory palate features ripe yellow apple, tangy lemon drop candy and hazelnut set against a delicate, silky perlage. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora
production: Alta Langa Metodo Classico DOCG, Italy
content: White spring-flower, bread-crust and Anjou pear aromas delicately waft out of the glass. A blend of Pinot Nero and Chardonnay, the elegant palate offers creamy yellow apple, brioche and tangerine zest, alongside bright acidity and a soft perlage. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora
production: Alta Langa Metodo Classico DOCG, Italy
content: Brillantes, intensives Strohgelb. Öffnet sich in der Nase auf intensives Bananen-Noten, satter gelber Pfirsich und Bananenyoghurt, leicht nach Kamille, einladend. Am Gaumen ausgewogen und klar, breitet sich mit zarter Cremigkeit am Gaumen aus, feinste Fruchtsüße, gute Länge mit rundem Abgang.

title: Banfi Cuvee Aurora
production: Alta Langa Metodo Classico DOCG, Italy
content: 轻酒体，泡沫冲，酵母味不重。
